aws::graph::propositions: Data Security Risks for Amazon
We collect large amounts of data.
We process large amounts of data.
We store large amounts of data.
We transmit large amounts of data.
The data includes confidential information.
The data includes classified information.
The data includes sensitive information.
The data includes proprietary information.
The data includes business information.
The data includes personal information.
Failure to prevent data loss could expose us to risk of loss.
Failure to prevent data loss could expose our customers to risk of loss.
Failure to prevent data theft could expose us to risk of disclosure of information.
Failure to prevent data theft could expose our customers to risk of disclosure of information.
Failure to prevent data misuse could expose us to risk of misuse of information.
Failure to prevent data misuse could expose our customers to risk of misuse of information.
Failure to prevent unauthorized access could adversely affect our operating results.
Failure to detect security incidents could result in litigation.
Failure to detect security vulnerabilities could result in liability.
Failure to mitigate security incidents could result in regulatory action.
Regulatory action could be under laws related to privacy.
Regulatory action could be under laws related to data use.
Regulatory action could be under laws related to data protection.
Regulatory action could be under laws related to data security.
Regulatory action could be under laws related to network security.
Regulatory action could be under laws related to consumer protection.
Security incidents could deter customers from using our stores.
Security incidents could deter customers from using our products.
Security incidents could deter customers from using our services.
Security incidents could deter sellers from using our stores.
Security incidents could deter sellers from using our products.
Security incidents could deter sellers from using our services.
Security incidents could harm our business.
Security incidents could harm our reputation.

text:
##### We Could Be Harmed by Data Loss or Other Security Incidents

Because we collect, process, store, and transmit large amounts of data, including confidential, classified, sensitive, proprietary, and business and personal information, failure to prevent, detect, or mitigate data loss, theft, misuse, unauthorized access, or other security incidents or vulnerabilities affecting our or our vendors or customers technology, products, and systems, could: expose us or our customers to a risk of loss, disclosure, or misuse of such information; adversely affect our operating results; result in litigation, liability, or regulatory action (including under laws related to privacy, data use, data protection, data security, network security, and consumer protection); deter customers or sellers from using our stores, products, and services; and otherwise harm our business and reputation.
